title: Paper Airplanes
summaries: The Paper Airplane and White Paper Airplane are consumable ranged weapons. When thrown, they will travel in a different path each time, as they are affected by wind speed and direction. This is especially apparent on a Windy Day. They are sometimes dropped by slimes that are carried by Windy Balloons, which can spawn during a Windy Day.
Unlike other consumable ranged weapons, Paper Airplanes always drop as an item when flying for too long, hitting a block, or hitting an enemy.
Due to their extremely low damage and rarity, they are not really a practical weapon, more a novelty item similar to the kites.

statistics.Sell: 10
